confirm-unlock.name: Confirm unlock
confirm-unlock.description: If you think this is overkill I have a friend who left the game with confirm exit on thrice at the very end of throat of the world

disable-restart.name: Disable restart
disable-restart.description: doesn't let you click r or restart button in pause menu

disable-dt.name: Disable death tracker button
disable-dt.description: On levels such as top 10000 cheese simply opening death tracker crashes your game (let's not talk about the top 10000 cheese room 14 incident)

mod-on.name: lock exit
mod-on.description: you can switch it on and off here or in pause menu
